translations: 开（黄金成色单位）；克拉（宝石的重量单位，等于 carat）

sentences.sentence: Condensed into four 1.1 karats a perfect square diamond, and platinum to tell our engagement.
sentences.translation: 完美凝结成四颗1. 1克拉方钻，与铂金诉说着我们的约定。

sentences.sentence: Girl, cut out the karats. We don't need little piercings everywhere on your face because this is a beautiful young girl as well.
sentences.translation: 孩子，去掉那些宝石吧，我们不需要你把脸上刺穿上太多的东西，因为你已经是个漂亮姑娘。
